meanings.definition: A calendar of saints' days and other feast days.
meanings.sent1: The menologies helped the church keep track of important dates.
meanings.sent2: I always refer to the menologies to know when to celebrate specific saints.
meanings.sent3: The menologies were so detailed, they even included the feast days of lesser-known saints.
meanings.sent4: Her menologies were like a treasure trove of historical celebrations.
meanings.sent5: The menologies painted a colorful picture of the annual festivities.

meanings.definition: A collection of biographies of saints.
meanings.sent1: In the library, you can find various menologies detailing the lives of different saints.
meanings.sent2: She cherished her grandmother's old menologies filled with stories of holy figures.
meanings.sent3: Reading the menologies felt like diving into the extraordinary lives of saints.
meanings.sent4: Her menologies were like a gallery of inspiring tales of faith and miracles.
meanings.sent5: The menologies brought to life the incredible journeys of the saints.

meanings.definition: A list or catalog of events or occurrences.
meanings.sent1: The menologies for the year included all the important events in the town.
meanings.sent2: I kept a menologies of all the memorable moments from our family vacations.
meanings.sent3: His menologies of mishaps and adventures always made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The menologies of the past year read like a thrilling novel of ups and downs.
meanings.sent5: The menologies captured the essence of each significant happening.
